long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JSON Formatter is a powerful and user-friendly Google Chrome extension designed to make working with JSON data effortless and efficient. 

Whether you're a developer, a data analyst, or just someone dealing with JSON, this tool is engineered to streamline your workflow and enhance your data visualisation.

Key Features:

Automatic Formatting: Instantly transforms any JSON URL or file into a beautifully formatted and readable format. Say goodbye to the daunting wall of text and hello to clearly organised data.

Syntax Highlighting: Utilizes color-coded syntax highlighting to differentiate between keys, strings, and other data types, making it easier to read and understand complex JSON data at a glance.

Collapsible Sections: Navigate through large JSON files with ease. Expand or collapse sections of data with a single click, enabling you to focus on the information that matters most to you.

Customisable View: Tailor the viewing experience to your preference. Adjust the indentation level to control the depth of formatting, making your JSON data as compact or as expanded as you like.

Benefits:

Enhanced Productivity: Spend less time deciphering JSON data and more time on development. JSON Formatter's intuitive interface and powerful features save you valuable time and effort.

Seamless Integration: Works directly in your Chrome browser without the need for external tools or software. Whether you're working on local files or browsing the web, JSON Formatter is always just a click away.

Ideal for:

Developers, data analysts, students, and anyone who regularly interacts with JSON data. Whether you're debugging code, analysing data, or simply curious, JSON Formatter is the perfect tool to enhance your JSON experience.
